```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

remove.packages("htmlwidgets")
remove.packages("DiagrammeR")
remove.packages("vembedr")

install.packages("htmlwidgets")
install.packages("DiagrammeR")
install.packages("vembedr")


```

## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}

library(DiagrammeR)
library(htmlwidgets)

mermaid("
flowchart TD
    subgraph Traditional
        A[Target Group] --> B{CARIN Evaluation}
        B --> C1[Control Assessment]
        B --> C2[Attitude Assessment]
        B --> C3[Reciprocity Assessment]
        B --> C4[Identity Assessment]
        B --> C5[Need Assessment]
        C1 & C2 & C3 & C4 & C5 --> D[Deservingness Judgment]
        D --> E[Policy Support]
    end

    subgraph Carceral_Context
        F[Carceral Label] --> G[Identity]
        G --> H[Affect (Disgust)]
        G --> I[CARIN Evaluation]
        H --> I
        I -.->|Blocks| J1[Control]
        I -.->|Blocks| J2[Attitude]
        I -.->|Blocks| J3[Reciprocity]
        I -.->|Blocks| J4[Identity]
        I -.->|Blocks| J5[Need]
        J1 & J2 & J3 & J4 & J5 --> K[Deservingness Perception]
        K --> L[Policy Opposition]
    end

    subgraph Experience_Effects
        M[Identity Effects] --> N[Identity]
        N -.->|Disrupts| H
        N -.->|Disrupts| G
        N -->|Enables| O[Secondary Judgment]
        O -->|Allows| P[CARIN Consideration]
    end

    style Traditional fill:#f5f5f5
    style Carceral_Context fill:#ffe6e6
    style Experience_Effects fill:#e6ffe6
")

```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
